('client',): SELECT Location, Name FROM Client WHERE Name = '[Client.Name]';
SELECT Industry, Name FROM Client WHERE Name = '[Client.Name]';
('employee',): SELECT JobTitle, Name FROM Employee WHERE Name = '[Employee.Name]';
SELECT Department, Name FROM Employee WHERE Name = '[Employee.Name]';
SELECT SupervisorOrManager, Name FROM Employee WHERE Name = '[Employee.Name]';
('project', ): SELECT StartDate, Name FROM Project WHERE Name = '[Project.Name]';
SELECT EndDate, Name FROM Project WHERE Name = '[Project.Name]';
SELECT Client, Name FROM Project WHERE Name = '[Project.Name]';
SELECT ProjectDirector, Name FROM Project WHERE Name = '[Project.Name]';
SELECT ProjectManager, Name FROM Project WHERE Name = '[Project.Name]';
